instruction.value: Administer by direct injection over 15 seconds. May repeat dose every 45 seconds until patient is awake.
Administer by direct injection over 15 seconds. May repeat dose after 45 seconds, and then every minute up to a MAXIMUM total dose of 1 mg (or 0.05 mg/kg, whichever is less).
May repeat dose every minute up to a total dose of 1 mg.
Administer by continuous infusion following initial dose.
Administer initial dose over 15 seconds by direct injection.
Administer by direct injection, after 60 seconds of initial dose if desired level of consciousness not obtained. May repat dose at 1 minute intervals, up to a MAXIMUM total dose of 1 mg.
Administer initial dose by dIrect injection over 30 seconds, followed by a series of 0.3 mg doses administered over 30 seconds at 1 minute intervals.

additionalnotes.value: Reversal of Benzodiazepine effects. MAXIMUM total cumulative dose should not exceed 50 mcg/kg or 1 mg, whichever is smaller.
Reversal of General Anesthesia / Sedation. Maximum single dose: 0.2 mg.
Benzodiazepine Overdose. MAXIMUM single dose: 0.2 mg
Benzodiazepine Overdose. Infusion following initial dose.
Benzodiazepine Overdose. MAXIMUM Recommended dose: 3 mg.
Benzodiazepine Overdose. If drowsiness recurs, a continuous infusion may be used, titrate dose to the desired level of arousal.
